lines.text: He... cast <c=#FF6000>Emergency Exit,</c> and used fire to teleport into the path of his own bullet.
Great theory. Really takes into account how Slick ain't a wizard, and explains why he'd do that.
And even if you hadn't already explained them details...
It'd definitely be possible to cast that spell and step into some fire before the bullet hit the wall.
Good to see your sarcasm's still working, buddy.
